content.rendered:
Soul-stirring rhythms

An invitation to seven magical evenings

The Nishagandhi festival, conducted by the Department of Tourism, Kerala is a seven-day cultural fiesta. Held at the Nishagandhi Auditorium, this festival is an opportunity for art lovers to get familiar with some of the best and upcoming talents in India.

excerpt.rendered: Soul-stirring rhythms An invitation to seven magical evenings The Nishagandhi festival, conducted by the Department of Tourism, Kerala is a seven-day cultural fiesta. Held at the Nishagandhi Auditorium, this festival is an opportunity for art lovers to get familiar with some of the best and upcoming talents in India.
